kinesigenic dyskinesia
What are the treatments for familial paroxysmal kinesigenic dyskinesia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of familial paroxysmal kinesigenic dyskinesia:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Familial Paroxysmal Kinesigenic Dyskinesia  - Genetic Testing Registry: Dystonia 10   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Gene
